patchNotes.title: Talent Rework and Hero small changes

texts.text: When allied heroes nearby dance while E.T.C. is dancing, he gains 100% increased cooldown reduction.
Write 'Storm, earth and Fire' to start playing the music to close heros and write a message on the game chat to all players 'E.T.C. is ROCKING'.

general.developerCommentary: This changes are for roleplay reasons..truly

<vanilla, talents, 4, 1> is a problematic talent it makes <modified, abilities, basic, 1> extremely FUN but at the same time allows E.T.C. to truly play his role as a tank correctly. <vanilla, talents, 4, 0> and <vanilla, talents, 4, 2> are both strong and fun but <vanilla, talents, 4, 1> can't be truly beaten and will always be priority except for those who cheese him as a Solo Laner.

patchNotes.developerCommentary: E.T.C. is one of the best complete Tank kits on the games but has suffered a lot with nerfs that made him go from top tier tank to have a lower presence in the game. My objective here is not to bring him to the top again but rather change some aspects that i see as problematic on his talents interactions as further changes be numeric adjusted.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 0>
changes.developerCommentary: I want to buff that talent while making it a option to pick it with <vanilla, talents, 1, 1> to combo

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 4, 2>
changes.developerCommentary: Here Speed Metal will have the possibility to combo with <vanilla, talents, 4, 0> and also be an option of area based utility by competing with other two similar talents

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 0>

texts.text: Additional functionality: Deals 35% more basic attack damage while <modified, abilities, basic, 2> is active

changes.developerCommentary: Buffing the talent to make it self-sufficient and adjust numbers after so i can change <vanilla, talents, 7, 1> and evade direct vertical combos. Even if <vanilla, talents, 1, 1> is a combo it's a weaker link that doesn't necessarily makes you pick both.

changes.name: NEW: <modified, talents, 4, 2>

texts.text: Enemy heroes hit by E.T.C. basic attacks have their damage reduced by 15% for 1.25 seconds and E.T.C. restores 6 mana

changes.developerCommentary: I really wanted to make an alternative for basic attack E.T.C. focused on utility

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 4, 2>
changes.developerCommentary: Bringing Speed Metal to make that a tier for picking out which area passive you want to focus on

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 1> renamed to <modified, talents, 7, 1>

texts.text: Changed functionality: <modified, abilities, trait, 0> empowers E.T.C. next basic attack making it reduces the target armor by 15 for 1.5 seconds.

changes.developerCommentary: With the current effect being mixed on <modified, talents, 4, 1> my objective was to make something related to basic attacks but without the worry of making it an obligatory complement but rather one option on combos.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 2>

texts.text: Additional functionality: <modified, abilities, basic, 1> deal 250 extra damage against shields and summons

changes.developerCommentary: I focusing this talent to a niche.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 0>

texts.text: Additional functionality: Refunds 55 mana when hitting 2 targets

changes.developerCommentary: With the buff+nerf to <modified, abilities, basic, 1> this talent would be indirected nerfed and would undermine the utility of that talent by making E.T.C extremely mana hungry.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 16, 2> renamed to <modified, talents, 16, 2>

texts.text: Changed functionality: While using PowerSlide you can use <modified, abilities, basic, 1> but it will instead pull enemies towards you.

changes.developerCommentary: You will able to finally not miss your <vanilla, abilities, heroic, 0> on Lucio players. Thus i was thinkering about the talents and found this ideia to be extremely funny

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 16, 1> renamed to <modified, talents, 16, 1>

texts.text: Changed functionality: Activate to Throw a mic on the target position and after 2 seconds E.T.C. will teleport to that MIC. Can be teleported casting <modified, abilities, heroic, 0>. <modified, talents, 16, 1> teleport timing will be stopped when using <modified, abilities, heroic, 1>

changes.developerCommentary: I wanted to make an alternative version of <vanilla, talents, 20, 4> specially related to Mosh Pit usage and found this to be fun to imagine.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 2>

texts.text: Additional functionality: Each enemy hero affected by <vanilla, talents, 20, 2> decreases E.T.C. respawn time by 2 second each second.

changes.developerCommentary: <vanilla, talents, 20, 2> is fun and make a lot of POG moments but in the end is not something you could rely on and sometimes you could even <vanilla, talents, 20, 2> 5 players but your entire team is dead SO for that reason i am bringing a buff so <vanilla, talents, 20, 2> would never be useless only if it everyone

changes.name: NEW: <modified, talents, 20, 3>

texts.text: Activate to make your next <modified, abilities, basic, 1> knockback enemies 75% farther

changes.developerCommentary: It's extremely ROCK AND ROLL to increase the volume.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 3>, <vanilla, talents, 20, 4>
changes.developerCommentary: Both of these talents come from a generic setup. I am reworking all talents to serve mostly my taste and i see those generic talents ones that undervalues the character roleplay
